name: No Way Home (Apple Arcade)
description:
Stranded in a strange galaxy, you must fight for survival using only your wits, your ship, and your party planning robot companion. Explore the universe, befriend bizarre aliens, and blast through hordes of monsters as you endeavor to find a way home.

From the team that brought you Death Squared, Thumb Drift and One More Line.

Art direction & world by Scott Vanden Bosch

Story by Mike Rosenthal

Voiced by Mick Lauer (RicePirate) and Cassie Ewulu

FEATURES

• A rich story mode set across a huge universe.

• Daily Challenge - run and gun for daily glory with a new mega weapon every day.

• Stunning hand-drawn artwork.

• 50+ weapons to discover, craft and upgrade.

• Over 60 unique enemies to battle.

• An immersive mission system.

• Epic Boss battles!

• A procedural universe, every game is unique!

• With multiple paths to take, it's up to you to discover your own path to survival!

• Trade, collect, loot and plunder precious cargo.

• Full controller and touch screen support.

No Way Home is set in an expanding universe. We’ll be updating with new content, stories and features. Stay tuned!
